  • Gently massage into wet hair and scalp with fingertips to work into lather.

"},{"specification_name":"Ingredients","specification_value":"Key Ingredients:
  • Ginger Root: For over 2500 years, ginger root has been used all over the world for its amazing hair benefits. With its antiseptic properties, it reduces scalp infections and dandruff. It also has conditioning properties that improve the look and feel of hair.
  • Tea Tree Oil: It clears the follicles and allows hair to breathe. Its antifungal nature prevents buildup of excess oil on the scalp.
Other Ingredients: Aqua, Caprylyl/capryl glucoside, sodium methyl cocoyl taurate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, PEG-150 Polyglyceryl-2 Tristearate (and) Laureth-3 (and) Dipropylene Glycol, Propanediol, Coco-Glucoside (and) Glyceryl Oleate, Glycerin, Coco diethanolamide, Climbazole, Polyquaternium-6, Panthenol, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Disodium EDTA, Caprylhydroxamic Acid (and) Phenethyl Alcohol, Fragrance."},{"specification_name":"Key Ingredient","specification_value":"Tea Tree"},{"specification_name":"Minimum Shelf Life in Months","specification_value":"36"},{"specification_name":"Minimum Usable Period in Months","specification_value":"36"},{"specification_name":"Preference","specification_value":"Paraben-Free"},{"specification_name":"Special Features","specification_value":"

  • Certified safe and pH balanced formula
  • 100% vegan and cruelty free product with recyclable packaging
  • Free from synthetic color, parabens, silicone, sulphate, mineral oil and preservatives
  • Deep cleansing shampoo that purifies scalp by removing dandruff and flakes
  • Enriched with the goodness of ginger root and tea tree oil
  • Restores scalp health by soothing dryness and itchiness
"},{"specification_name":"Sustainable","specification_value":"Regular"},{"specification_name":"Total Shelf Life in Months","specification_value":"6"}]
